Reviews.Title: A++ chromebook
Reviews.Author: Dongqi H.
Reviews.Content: Hey, I got this for 199 bucks. It is very convenient and super fast since this is the best C710 type you can imagine. But if it is priced higher than 220, don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Very dissapointing
Reviews.Author: Nannuu
Reviews.Content: I've been using computers for many, many years. Both Mac and PC. I bought this computer because I wanted to try a new operating system. I've had this computer for many weeks now and still cannot transfer pictures, ...nor can I do a few other things. NO OPERATING MANUAL WAS INCLUDED, except an online manual, which is one HUGE pain in the, ...you know where!  Other than that, ...it's a nice unit.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel A4 1.1 GHz
4 GB DDR3
16 GB Solid-State Drive
11.6-Inch Screen
Chrome
ProductInfo.Name: Acer NU.SH7AA.013;C710-2815 11.6-Inch Laptop
